revised_title: An Account of the Earthquakes Felt at Constantinople in 1754 and 1755
tldr: The author, James Porter, provides a detailed account of the earthquakes experienced in Constantinople in 1754 and 1755. He describes the damage caused, the direction of the shocks, and the possible connection between the earthquakes and a mysterious cloud phenomenon. Porter also discusses the construction of buildings in the region and their susceptibility to earthquakes.
